name: Hunting Partner
description:
One day as a hunter and his trusty hunting partner went out on a hunting trip as usual things started taking a turn for the worse..... Both of them exhausted and tired struggle and work together to protect each other from the incoming hordes of what used to be their prey. Notice:  This game is made for EIGF Jam. 



You play as the hunter or his dog

You Can Manually Swap 

This bar indicates how long you can play

With every character and you will be

Forced to change once it depletes



Move: W-A-S-D

Attack: LMB

ChangeChar: Space

Hints:

Enemies attack the inactive character

The character you control is immune

Leveling up heals you a little

SURVIVE!

GoodLuck.

this game is made by:
Developer: Nova
Artist: Rouhayem

((All the visuals/assets, code, and sound effects you see are handmade by us during the jam period.))

Used assets: Theme music - Deadrising Ost

تنبيه اللعبة تدعم كل من اللغتين, العربية والإنجليزية نتمنى لك تجربة ممتعة مع العلم ان جميع العناصر المستخدمة في اللعبة من تأثيرات بصرية ورسوميات وتأثيرات صوتية وبرمجة هي من صنع شخصي لمنشئين اللعبة وفقط الموسيقي هي من تم استخدامها بشكل جاهز وتم وضع المصدر الخاص بها حفاظا على حقوق الطبع والنشر.
